com.btmatthews.ldapunit

Class DirectoryTester

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryTester

  • public class DirectoryTester
extends Object
    Utility that maintains a connection to the LDAP directory server and provides assert and verify methods to test the LDAP directory contents.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DirectoryTester()
      Initialise the LDAP directory tester using the default hostname of localhost and port number of 10389.
      DirectoryTester(String hostname, int port)
      Initialise the LDAP directory tester by connecting to the LDAP directory server using the hostname and port.
      DirectoryTester(String hostname, int port, int retries, int timeout)
      Initialise the LDAP directory tester by connecting to the LDAP directory server using the hostname and port.The connection attempt is retried a maximum of retries times with a timeout of timeout for each attempt.
      DirectoryTester(String hostname, int port, String bindDN, String password)
      Initialise the LDAP directory tester by connecting to the LDAP directory server using the hostname and port and bind to it using the bindDN and password.
      DirectoryTester(String hostname, int port, String bindDN, String password, int retries, int timeout)
      Initialise the LDAP directory tester by connecting to the LDAP directory server using the hostname and port and bind to it using the bindDN and password.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void assertDNExists(String dn)
      Assert that an entry identified by dn exists.
      void assertDNHasAttribute(String dn, String attributeName)
      Assert that the entry identified by dn has an attribute named attributeName.
      void assertDNHasAttributeValue(String dn, String attributeName, String... attributeValue)
      Assert that the entry identified by dn has an attribute named attributeName with the attribute value(s) attributeName.
      void assertDNIsA(String dn, String objectclass)
      Assert that the entry identified by dn is of type objectclass.
      void disconnect()
      Disconnect from the LDAP directory server.
      boolean verifyDNExists(String dn)
      Verify that an entry identified by dn exists.
      boolean verifyDNHasAttribute(String dn, String attributeName)
      Verify that the entry identified by dn has an attribute named attributeName.
      boolean verifyDNHasAttributeValue(String dn, String attributeName, String... attributeValue)
      Verify that the entry identified by dn has an attribute named attributeName with the attribute value(s) attributeName.
      boolean verifyDNIsA(String dn, String objectclass)
      Verify that the entry identified by dn is of type objectclass.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DirectoryTester

        public DirectoryTester()
        Initialise the LDAP directory tester using the default hostname of localhost and port number of 10389.
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • DirectoryTester

        public DirectoryTester(String hostname,
               int port)
        Initialise the LDAP directory tester by connecting to the LDAP directory server using the hostname and port.
        Parameters:
        hostname - The host name of the directory server.
        port - The TCP port number of the directory server.
        Throws:
        DirectoryTesterException - If there was a problem connecting to the LDAP directory server.

      • DirectoryTester

        public DirectoryTester(String hostname,
               int port,
               int retries,
               int timeout)
        Initialise the LDAP directory tester by connecting to the LDAP directory server using the hostname and port.The connection attempt is retried a maximum of retries times with a timeout of timeout for each attempt.
        Parameters:
        hostname - The host name of the directory server.
        port - The TCP port number of the directory server.
        retries - The maximum number of connection attempts.
        timeout - The timeout for each connection attempt.
        Throws:
        DirectoryTesterException - If there was a problem connecting to the LDAP directory server.
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • DirectoryTester

        public DirectoryTester(String hostname,
               int port,
               String bindDN,
               String password)
        Initialise the LDAP directory tester by connecting to the LDAP directory server using the hostname and port and bind to it using the bindDN and password.
        Parameters:
        hostname - The host name of the directory server.
        port - The TCP port number of the directory server.
        bindDN - The DN used to bind to the LDAP directory server.
        password - The password used to bind to the LDAP directory server.
        Throws:
        DirectoryTesterException - If there was a problem connecting to the LDAP directory server.

      • DirectoryTester

        public DirectoryTester(String hostname,
               int port,
               String bindDN,
               String password,
               int retries,
               int timeout)
        Initialise the LDAP directory tester by connecting to the LDAP directory server using the hostname and port and bind to it using the bindDN and password. The connection attempt is retried a maximum of retries times with a timeout of timeout for each attempt.
        Parameters:
        hostname - The host name of the directory server.
        port - The TCP port number of the directory server.
        bindDN - The DN used to bind to the LDAP directory server.
        password - The password used to bind to the LDAP directory server.
        retries - The maximum number of connection attempts.
        timeout - The timeout for each connection attempt.
        Throws:
        DirectoryTesterException - If there was a problem connecting to the LDAP directory server.
        Since:
        1.0.1

    • Method Detail

      • verifyDNExists

        public boolean verifyDNExists(String dn)
        Verify that an entry identified by dn exists.
        Parameters:
        dn - The distinguished name.
        Returns:
        true if an entry identified by dn exists. Otherwise, false is returned.

      • verifyDNIsA

        public boolean verifyDNIsA(String dn,
                  String objectclass)
        Verify that the entry identified by dn is of type objectclass.
        Parameters:
        dn - The distinguished name.
        objectclass - The type name.
        Returns:
        true if an entry identified by dn exists and has attribute named objectclass. Otherwise, false is returned.

      • verifyDNHasAttribute

        public boolean verifyDNHasAttribute(String dn,
                           String attributeName)
        Verify that the entry identified by dn has an attribute named attributeName.
        Parameters:
        dn - The distinguished name.
        attributeName - The attribute name.
        Returns:
        true if an entry identified by dn exists and has an attributed named attributeName. Otherwise, false is returned.

      • verifyDNHasAttributeValue

        public boolean verifyDNHasAttributeValue(String dn,
                                String attributeName,
                                String... attributeValue)
        Verify that the entry identified by dn has an attribute named attributeName with the attribute value(s) attributeName.
        Parameters:
        dn - The distinguished name.
        attributeName - The attribute name.
        attributeValue - The attribute value(s).
        Returns:
        true if an antry identified by dn exists with an an attribute named attributeName that has value(s) attributeValue. Otherwise, false is returned.
